vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.19
§ Hashum = "rich"
1) head of a family of 223 exiles returning with Zerubbabel
2) one of the priests or Levites who stood on Ezra's left while he read the law
vocabinfos._es_Definition: jefe de familia; post exílico ey de Edom
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈順 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "豐富"
1)跟隨所羅巴伯被擄歸回的一個家族領袖
2)站在以斯拉左邊宣讀律法的祭司或利未人之一, 可能與(1)同
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
哈顺 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "丰富"
1)跟随所罗巴伯被掳归回的一个家族领袖
2)站在以斯拉左边宣读律法的祭司或利未人之一, 可能与(1)同

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.8.4
§ Hashum = "rich"
1) head of a family of 223 exiles returning with Zerubbabel
2) one of the priests or Levites who stood on Ezra's left while he read the law

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.18
§ Hashum = "rich"
1) head of a family of 223 exiles returning with Zerubbabel
2) one of the priests or Levites who stood on Ezra's left while he read the law
